resources.string: Welcome to DavCal Beans where Coffee and your tastebuds are our Main Priority! Create an Account, view our Menu or start a new Order. If you have any questions, please vist our Contact Page for options on how to contacts us. We are Happy you are here! Enjoy!

Hi! We hope you find some coffee that might interest you! Anyways, you\'re here because you want to contact us; we are always happy to talk to new people so please do reach out to us whichever way is best for you! If you decide to email us, please allow us 24 hours to respond, thank you! We look forward to hearing from you!
